content: do you have that special someone who is the king or queen of your heart now you can make them their very own crown great for special occasions renaissance faires birthdays or any day at all makes a fun gift for men and women boys and girls this is a very easy pattern that can be worked up quickly perfect for advanced beginner crocheter through advanced you will need worsted weight yarn i hook and stitch markers dimensions fits 21 5 head the pattern is in pdf format and will be emailed to your account within 12 hours of payment thanks so much
